synopsis.text: Yamada-kun, an unexpected body-swap adventure, finds itself intertwining with the world of Yankee-kun to Megane-chan in a thrilling crossover anime. After an unforeseen accident, Ryuu Yamada finds himself in the body of Daichi Shinagawa, setting off a chain of events as he attempts to undo the swap. This short anime is a delightful blend of two popular manga series, offering fans a unique collaboration. The first Blu-ray Disc and DVD box sets of Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches, slated for release on August 26, will include this exciting crossover anime as a limited-edition bonus, along with a collaborative manga. Prepare for a double dose of entertainment as these two worlds collide in an unforgettable adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
